name: Golden Fall 2
description:
Golden Fall 2 is a static balanced Rogue Like.

You play as a hero who is thrown into the ancient sewage, with no weapon or equipment. You need to survive this horror and delve deeper in order to find a way out.

Golden Fall 2 plays as a rogue like, but the levels are not random generated. This is not a drawback, as the hand tailored level provide a very interesting challenge. It is also sewn with a story just like in an RPG.

Equipment, skills, spells, wepaons, magic items. Many types of enemies, terrain and challenged await you in this captivating dungeon crawl.
